title: BBC Local Live: Leicestershire on Thursday 9 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: man died from stab wound in city centre , police say .
lord janner 's alleged victims drop civil action .
£ 14m cash boost for city 's space industry .
selby faces fu at players championship .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live updates have now ended and will return tomorrow from 08:00 .

documents.title: lawrence unsure of foxes future
text: leicester city midfielder , tom lawrence , who is on loan at ipswich town , has told bbc radio suffolk that he is not sure if he has a future at king power stadium .
he said : `` i could n't say either way with regards to my future .
you never know what 's going to happen .
`` i 'll just take things from the summer when i speak to leicester .
i 'll see what they say and go from there . ''
the 23-year-old last played competitively .
for the foxes in a 0-0 draw with hull in march 2015 .
author: BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: space industry and roads investment 'an important milestone '
text: chancellor philip hammond has said money announced earlier for leicester 's space industry ( 13:09 ) and the county 's road network ( 15:05 ) are part of larger plans to maximise the economic potential of the midlands .
almost £ 14m is going towards boosting the leicester space park and national space centre ( above ) and £ 12m will be spent on developing the m1/j23 and a512 at loughborough .

mr hammond said : `` the midlands engine strategy is an important milestone , setting out the concrete actions we are taking , where we are not only investing in what it does well but also tackling some of the long-standing productivity barriers in the region including skills and connectivity .
`` it is a vital part of the government 's work to create an economy that works for everyone , and all parts of the country . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sherwood forest included in £ 392m 'midlands engine ' plan
text: sherwood forest is to receive investment as part of a the midlands engine scheme , which sets out a £ 392m government investment .
to maximise the potential of the midlands .
the plans will see £ 500,000 being spent on a new visitor centre at the nottinghamshire attraction and improvements to existing walking and cycle routes .

chancellor philip hammond made the announcement today in dudley and said money would also go towards other projects in the east and west midlands , including a £ 6m regeneration of derby city centre and improvements to road connections around loughborough .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: east midlands weather update : a clear , dry and chilly night
text: it will be a dry and chilly night , with clear spells and light winds .
however , cloud will gradually increase by the early hours .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: changes to leicestershire to london trains this weekend
text: east midlands trains tweets
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : sunny loughborough
text: it has been a gorgeous day across the region - including in loughborough where bbc weather watcher maggie t took this
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: zieler : city 's dubai trip has helped build team spirit
text: leicester city goalkeeper ron-robert zieler has spoken about how togetherness was a key theme during the three-day training game in dubai .
`` it has been a good opportunity for us to get away from england , '' .
the german international told lcfc tv hd .
`` i think one of the main reasons [ why we made the trip ] was to build team spirit .
`` we 've worked but we 've also had some leisure time so it is a combination of both . ''
watch : ron-robert zieler talks about the positive impact that warm weather training in dubai has had on the group :
he 's not premier league quality , let alone the champions league a waste of money leno should 've won the world cup instead of him
dont bad mind him , he won and he fought for it
hopefully that reflect in the champions league then zieler
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: civil claims dropped by three of lord janner 's alleged victims
text: three alleged victims of former leicester mp lord janner have dropped out of a civil case against his estate .

lord janner died in december 2015. facing multiple accusations of child sexual abuse and is now the subject of a delayed investigation by the national independent inquiry into child sexual abuse ( iicsa ) .
this latest development means six people are now taking civil action against the late labour peer 's assets .
a preliminary hearing at the high court in london has heard the late lord janner 's estate is worth £ 1.8m .
author: Daniel De Simone
BBC Home Affairs producer

documents.title: £ 12m cash windfall from government to improve county 's roads
text: as well as the £ 14m for leicester 's space industry ( see 13:09 ) , the local enterprise partnership has also secured £ 12m for the government to improve the county 's roads .
the money will be spent on junction and road improvements for the m1/j23 and the a512 at loughborough .
it is hoped that once this work is complete , it will provide greater access to land which will in turn help provide new houses and jobs .
nick rushton ( above ) , leader of leicestershire county council , said : `` this should help reap huge economic benefits for the area .

`` it means we can ensure there is the necessary infrastructure to support the building of 4,000 homes and potentially provide access to more than 5,700 jobs , including those created through the loughborough and leicester enterprise zone . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east midlands weather update : a warm and pleasant afternoon ahead
text: scattered cloud will build in places this afternoon , but there 'll still be plenty of bright and sunny spells .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: your photos : sunshine in kegworth
text: it looks a nice day at the deep lock in kegworth .
thanks to bbc weather watcher south notts for sending it in .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: man absconds from prison 'while working outside fence '
text: a prisoner has absconded from ranby prison in retford , nottinghamshire .
matthew rooney , 36 , from leicestershire , disappeared between 12:00 and 15:00 yesterday while working outside the perimeter fence .
nottinghamshire police said he `` does not pose a threat to the public . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: government pledges nearly £ 14m to help leicester 's space industry
text: nearly £ 14m has been awarded to leicester to help the space industry in the city , the government has announced .
a total of £ 12.9m has been earmarked for the development of the space park .
the space park 's first building is expected to be ready in 2019 .
once complete , it is hoped the park will create 600 jobs and support up to 100 businesses .
one million pounds has also been awarded to the national space centre ( above ) to help towards an extension .
all of this money for the city 's space industry was secured following a bid by the leicester & leicestershire enterprise partnership to the government in 2016 .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingman died from stab wound , police say
text: a man who died after being found injured on wednesday morning near leicester railway station died from a stab wound , a post-mortem examination has revealed .
leicestershire police are yet to formally identify the victim , but they believe he is a 30-year-old man who lived in the city .
a 30-year-old man , who was arrested on sus of murder , remains in custody , the force added .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: craig shakespeare : dubai training camp 'worthwhile '
text: leicester city 's interim manager craig shakespeare has said the club 's three-day training camp in dubai has helped build team spirit .
the foxes were able to head to sunnier climes because of arsenal 's participation in the quarter-finals of the fa cup this weekend .
`` it 's been a really worthwhile few days , '' shakespeare told leicester city 's official website .
`` we wanted to be able to give the players some downtime together , as a group , but it was important to balance that with some work to recover from recent games and to prepare for the tests ahead .
`` the spirit within this group has always been strong and a few days away together has certainly helped build on that , especially for some of the newer players in the group . ''
it was not all just work and no play though for the players - they got to visit the burj khalifa ( above ) - the world 's tallest building .
do n't look down
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: landlords 'not renting to benefit claimants in leicester '
text: there is not a single vacancy rental opportunity for a benefit claimant in leicester , a bbc investigation has found .
the bbc england data unit analysed listings on the website spareroom , looking at leicester and 18 other towns and cities across england .
out of 11,806 adverts for rooms to let across the country , just 2 % were open to people on benefits .
campaign groups have said it is `` naked discrimination '' and are calling for a change in the law .
but landlords believe more social housing needs to be built .
author: BBC News England

documents.title: your photos : sunny highcross
text: this is a great shot of the early morning sun reflecting off the cinema at highcross in leicester .
thanks to bbc weather watcher wato1129 for being up nice and early to capture it .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rugby union : leicester 's youngs returns for scotland clash
text: leicester tigers scrum-half ben youngs will return to the england starting xv for this saturday 's game with scotland at twickenham .
youngs , who began the 35-16 win against italy on the bench , replaces danny care in the number nine shirt .
fellow tigers man dan cole retains his place in the front row .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: snooker : selby bidding for place in players championship last four
text: leicester cueman mark selby will face marco fu later for a place in the semi-finals of the players championship .
selby , the current world number one and reigning world champion , beat ryan day on tuesday to set up today 's quarter-final .
no wonder mark is smiling - should he win this tournament , he 'll pocket a cool £ 125,000 for his troubles .
not bad for a week in llandudno
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police continue to investigate man 's death
text: police are continuing to investigate the death of a man found near leicester railway station in the early hours of wednesday morning .
a 30-year-old man has been arrested on sus of murder .
it was initially thought that the man who died may have been involved in a collision with a vehicle , but police now believe that may not be the case .
the results of a post-mortem examination - that was due to take place last night to determine the exact cause of the man 's death - are set to be revealed .
author: Eric Simpson
BBC News Online

documents.title: today 's leicester mercury front page
text: a murder investigation has been launched following the death of a man who was found injured on a city road in the early hours of wednesday morning .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rise in number of region 's ambulance staff off with stress
text: the number of ambulance staff in the east midlands taking time off due to stress and mental health problems has almost doubled in the past five years .
figures obtained by bbc radio leicester found that 518 members of staff were off with stress and mental health issues in 2015/16 .
this compares with 271 members of staff for the same reasons in 2011/12 .
the union unison has said this rise in the number of people going off with stress is because of extra targets and a lack of resources .
but east midlands ambulance service ( emas ) has said it is doing all it can to support staff .

`` we are committed to improving the level of support provided to staff who may experience stress and have introduced measures to ensure that help is provided as promptly as possible , '' an emas spokesman said .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

text: watch : east midlands weather outlook

BBC weather presenter

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome to thursday across leicestershire .
i 'll be with you until later with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you would like to share your and stories then please get in touch via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live
